meanings.definition: The place of origin or earliest known history of something.
meanings.sent1: The provenance of the ancient artifact was traced back to a small village.
meanings.sent2: Knowing the provenance of a rare gem can help determine its value.
meanings.sent3: The detective followed the provenance of the mysterious map to uncover its secrets.
meanings.sent4: The provenance of the old book whispered tales of its journey through time.
meanings.sent5: The provenance of the legendary sword was shrouded in mystery and intrigue.

meanings.definition: The history of ownership of a work of art or literature.
meanings.sent1: The provenance of the painting revealed it had been owned by famous collectors.
meanings.sent2: Art collectors often pay attention to the provenance of a piece before making a purchase.
meanings.sent3: The provenance of the rare manuscript was like a thrilling story of past owners.
meanings.sent4: The provenance of the ancient sculpture passed down tales of its journey through different hands.
meanings.sent5: The provenance of the lost play was a fascinating tale of discovery and acquisition.
